attributes.action:
Stop closures of local New look
Save local high street
attributes.additional_details:
We want this overturned. 
The town has no clothes shops. 
We need to save our high street.
attributes.background:
Want you to investigate the policies behind the local regeneration plan. 
With the intention of preventing the local high street from being none existent.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or House of Commons are responsible for.

Deciding whether to close certain branches of New Look is a matter New Look, not the Government or House of Commons.

We have published the following petitions about support for local retail businesses, which you might like to sign:

Reduce VAT to 5% for the retail sector " to help save our high street": https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/334137

Extend business rates holiday for retail & hospitality businesses: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551737

Fund vouchers for high streets, hospitality & the arts to every adult & child: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/330862
